channel.title: ::commands? -delta-
channel.description: Alright so i want to make a command that says the commands in it but I have no idea what to do.. Like i'd type in ::commands and it would show an interface with a list of commands and all that stuff.. So what would the command be? I know this might be a weird question

item.title: ::commands? -delta-
item.dc:creator: @Ferity Ferity
item.description:
@Ferity wrote:

if (command.startsWith("commands")) { sendQuest("@dre@commands", 8144); // Title clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("@dre@for normal players", 8147); sendQuest("@dbl@commands@dbl@", 8148); sendQuest(" ", 8149); sendQuest("@dbl@For Moderators@dbl@", 8150); sendQuest("@dbl@banuser@dbl@",8151); sendQuest("@dbl@mute@dbl@",8152); sendQuest("@dbl@unban@dbl@",8153); sendQuest("@dbl@unmute@dbl@",8154); sendQuest("@dbl@pure@dbl@",8155); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }
